text: Abdul Qadir Djaelani (20 October 1938 â€“ 23 February 2021) was an Indonesian Islamic preacher, writer, activist, and politician. He was a Member of Parliament from 2000 until 2004. He was a member of the Crescent Star Party. Djaelani died on 23 February 2021 in Jakarta, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Indonesian writers Category:Indonesian activists
title: Abdul Qadir Djaelani
